Dear Ms. Demmerle, 
I am thrilled to apply for the Cloud Architect position at Proximus Luxembourg. With a solid 
foundation in cloud technologies, DevOps practices, and AI innovation, I am eager to 
contribute my skills to designing and managing robust, secure, and scalable solutions that 
align with your business objectives. 
During my tenure at Whale Cloud Technologies, I spearheaded automated deployment 
pipelines by la Post Luxembourg and engineered software development cycle across major 
telecom software projects, fostering efficiency and scalability. My subsequent role as Senior 
IT Auditor at KPMG Luxembourg further refined my expertise in compliance and security, 
ensuring adherence to frameworks such as GDPR and ISO 27001—critical elements for 
designing reliable cloud architectures. 
My technical acumen aligns strongly with the requirements of this role, particularly my 
hands-on experience in: 
• Cloud Platforms: Proficient in hybrid and multi-cloud environments, including AWS 
and Azure, with expertise in designing distributed, scalable solutions. 
• AI and Data Innovation: I developed and fine-tuned AI models, such as the Mistral 
7B, for smart home automation, showcasing my ability to integrate cutting-edge AI 
technologies into practical applications. 
• AI Agent Architecting: My AI-driven compliance framework project demonstrates 
my ability to orchestrate modular AI agents, integrate blockchain for secure data 
management, and streamline processes—skills transferable to developing cloud-
native solutions. 
• DevOps and Microservices: Extensive experience with Kubernetes, Docker, CI/CD 
pipelines, and Terraform, ensuring efficient deployment and management of cloud-
native applications. 
Proximus Luxembourg’s focus on innovation and inclusivity aligns with my drive to explore 
emerging technologies and create adaptive, future-proof systems. With expertise in cloud 
architecture, agile methodologies, and AI advancements, I am confident in my ability to 
contribute effectively to your team’s objectives. My strong problem-solving skills, combined 
with a collaborative and multicultural approach, enable me to transform complex challenges 
into actionable, value-driven solutions, perfectly suited to Proximus Luxembourg’s mission 
of delivering cutting-edge IT and telecom services. 
Best regards, 
Ricky Tan 
+352 661777082 
rickytan79386@gmail.com

GitHub Profile
Dear Hiring Manager, 
I am excited to apply for the Automation Engineer position at Proximus Luxembourg. With a 
strong background in Devops, cloud computing, and AI-powered solutions, I am eager to 
contribute my expertise in workload automation, scripting, and database management to 
support Proximus Luxembourg's mission in accelerating digital transformation. 
Throughout my career, I have honed my skills in automation and system optimization. My 
recent project Python Microservice for Blog API showcases my ability to build and 
maintain RESTful APIs using FastAPI and SQLModel, demonstrating proficiency 
in database integration (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and Docker-based deployment. 
Additionally, my experience with Automic Workload Automation (UC4) aligns well with 
your requirements for designing and maintaining automation workflows. 
My work in Deploying LLaMA2 on Ubuntu VM reflects my capabilities in cloud 
computing and system administration, including Python scripting, virtual environments, 
and AI model deployment【15†source】. This expertise extends to my project on fine-
tuning Mistral 7B for smart home chatbots, where I developed AI-powered automation 
using large language models. Furthermore, my contributions to Harnessing Blockchain and 
AI for Compliance highlight my ability to integrate AI with blockchain for efficient data 
processing and automation【21†source】. 
Key technical skills relevant to this role include: 
• Workload Automation (Automic UC4): Experience in designing, configuring, and 
optimizing job workflows. 
• Scripting (Python, Bash, PowerShell): Proficiency in automation scripting for job 
scheduling and system maintenance. 
• Database Management (SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL): Expertise in 
writing queries and managing databases for backend systems. 
• Cloud Platforms (AWS, Azure): Knowledge of cloud-based automation and scalable 
system deployments. 
• ITIL Processes & CI/CD Pipelines: Understanding of IT service management and 
DevOps best practices. 
Beyond my technical capabilities, I am passionate about innovation and problem-solving, 
which aligns with Proximus Luxembourg’s drive towards 5G, AI, Machine Learning, and 
IoT solutions. My ability to troubleshoot complex systems and implement robust automation 
frameworks will be invaluable in ensuring high availability and performance of your 
automation processes. 
I am eager to bring my skills and experience to your team and contribute to Proximus 
Luxembourg’s vision of enabling smarter, more secure digital solutions. I welcome the 
opportunity to discuss how my expertise aligns with your needs. 
Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to your response. 
Best regards, 
Ruiqi Tan
Ruiqi Tan 
Rue du Chateau 63, Luxembourg, Luxembourg

Date: 25.02.2025 
Dear Hiring Manager, 
I am excited to apply for the AI/ML Engineer (Python) position at Deel. With over five 
years of experience in backend engineering and over two years in AI and machine 
learning, I am confident in my ability to develop innovative solutions that align with Deel’s 
mission of connecting global talent with companies worldwide. My background in Python 
development, PostgreSQL, and the data science stack, coupled with my hands-on 
experience in building AI-powered applications, positions me to make significant 
contributions to your cross-functional teams. 
At HomeSmartify.lu, I led the development of AI-driven dialogue systems, fine-
tuning Large Language Models (LLMs) like Mistral 7B to automate smart home 
configurations. This project involved creating robust ETL pipelines, handling large datasets, 
and ensuring seamless integration with end-user applications. I utilized Python extensively to 
develop and deploy scalable models, optimizing code for production environments and 
ensuring efficient model serving through cloud-based platforms. 
During my time at KPMG Luxembourg, I spearheaded the creation of data-driven solutions 
that improved fund reconciliation processes by 30%. This involved collaborating with cross-
functional teams, including business stakeholders and data scientists, to design and 
implement SQL-based pipelines and RESTful APIs for data extraction, transformation, and 
loading. My work focused on ensuring data integrity and optimizing backend systems for 
performance and scalability. 
My MBA in Blockchain & Big Data from HEC Liège Luxembourg, for which I was 
awarded a scholarship, further strengthened my technical and strategic skill set. My research 
centered on using blockchain technology and the Ocean Protocol to enhance compliance 
processes for SMEs, demonstrating my ability to merge advanced technologies with practical 
business solutions. This project also involved developing predictive models and 
implementing them into real-world use cases—skills that translate directly into the demands 
of the AI/ML Engineer role at Deel. 
Throughout my career, I have remained committed to continuous learning and collaboration. 
I thrive in team environments where I can engage with engineers, product managers, and 
business stakeholders to deliver solutions that address complex challenges. My experience 
participating in the Kaggle LLM preference prediction competition further honed my 
expertise in information retrieval, text processing, and NLP techniques. 
I am particularly drawn to Deel’s vision of breaking down global hiring barriers and 
fostering inclusivity through technology. The opportunity to contribute to a platform that 
empowers companies and talents worldwide resonates deeply with my values and 
professional goals.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to discussing how my background 
in AI development, backend engineering, and data science can help drive Deel’s 
innovative solutions forward. 
Best regards, 
Ruiqi Tan 
rickytan79386@gmail.com | +352 661777082
Dear Hiring Manager, 
I am excited to apply for the ML Platform Engineer position at Synthesia. The opportunity to 
join a team revolutionizing video communication through AI resonates deeply with my career 
ambitions and technical expertise. With over five years of industry experience in DevOps, AI 
solutions, and machine learning infrastructure, I am confident in my ability to help accelerate 
the development and deployment of Synthesia’s AI models at scale. 
During my tenure at KPMG Luxembourg as a Senior IT Auditor, I led projects ensuring 
compliance with international standards like ISO 27001 and DORA while developing data 
solutions that improved fund reconciliation processes by 30%. These experiences have honed 
my ability to manage complex cloud infrastructures and ensure robust, compliant systems. 
My hands-on work with AWS and Azure, combined with extensive use of Docker, aligns 
with your need for scalable cloud solutions. 
In my recent entrepreneurial venture, I developed and fine-tuned Large Language Models 
(LLMs) for smart home dialogues, integrating CI/CD pipelines and managing cloud-based 
deployments. This project echoes Synthesia’s commitment to making AI accessible and 
scalable. Moreover, my contributions to projects like deploying LLaMA2 on Ubuntu 
VMs and creating microservices with FastAPI and MySQL demonstrate my proficiency in 
Python-based systems and infrastructure automation. 
My academic foundation, culminating in an MBA in Blockchain & Big Data from HEC 
Liège Luxembourg, complements my technical background, allowing me to approach 
challenges with a strategic mindset. Synthesia’s mission to democratize video content 
creation, especially for large organizations, aligns with my passion for building user-centric, 
AI-driven platforms. 
What excites me most about this role is the chance to collaborate directly with researchers 
and data scientists. Throughout my career, I’ve thrived in cross-functional environments—
optimizing data pipelines, enhancing model training workflows, and ensuring infrastructure 
resilience. I look forward to bringing this collaborative spirit to Synthesia, where I can help 
streamline processes that underpin your groundbreaking AI video communications platform. 
Thank you for considering my application. I am eager to discuss how my background can 
contribute to Synthesia’s continued success and innovation. 
Warm regards, 
Ruiqi Tan
Dear Hiring Manager, 
I feel myself very suitable for the role Analyste-Programmeur RH at CFL. With a strong 
background in IT auditing, DevOps engineering, and software development, I am confident 
that my skills align well with the needs of your team. I am multilingua speaking english, 
german, chinese and french (B1) level. 
Throughout my career, I have worked on designing and implementing IT solutions that 
enhance business processes, improve system security, and optimize software deployment. As 
a Senior IT Auditor at KPMG Luxembourg, I conducted IT security audits, assessed 
regulatory compliance (ISO 27001, DORA, GDPR, PSD2), and automated data analysis to 
streamline IT controls. My experience in DevOps engineering at Whale Cloud 
Technologies (Alibaba Group) further strengthened my expertise in web and mobile 
development, where I built and managed CI/CD pipelines, integrated APIs, and ensured the 
security and scalability of cloud-based platforms. 
In addition to my corporate experience, I have actively contributed to innovative projects, 
such as: 
• Developing a chatbot using fine-tuned AI models to assist users in configuring 
smart home solutions, an experience that demonstrates my ability to create interactive, 
user-friendly applications. 
• Deploying LLaMA2 on an Ubuntu VM, optimizing machine learning models for 
real-world applications. 
• Building a FastAPI-based microservice with MySQL, showcasing my proficiency 
in backend development and database administration. 
I am particularly excited about this opportunity at CFL because it combines my technical 
skills with a domain that has a tangible impact on HR processes. My experience with 
Node.js, JavaScript, PL/SQL, API integrations, and Unix/Linux environments aligns 
closely with the role’s requirements. Furthermore, my working experience as deployment 
manager on-site by la Post lxuembourg enables me to translate complex technical challenges 
into practical solutions that benefit end-users. 
Beyond my technical expertise, I take pride in my ability to work autonomously while 
fostering collaboration within cross-functional teams. My past roles as Devops at project 
“UP-drei” in vienna required me to coordinate between developers and clients, document 
processes, train users, and provide technical support—skills that are crucial for ensuring 
smooth system implementations in an HR environment. 
I am eager to bring my experience in IT development, security, and automation to CFL and 
contribute to building innovative HR applications. I look forward to the opportunity to 
discuss how my skills and background can support your team. 
I am available for an interview at your convenience. 
Best regards, 
Ruiqi Tan

Date: 25.02.2025 
Dear Hiring Manager, 
I am excited to apply for the Senior Software Engineer – Generative AI position at Elastic. 
With over five years of software development and AI/ML engineering experience, I bring 
a blend of technical expertise, problem-solving ability, and a commitment to delivering user-
focused solutions. Elastic’s mission of harnessing AI to enhance data-driven security 
operations aligns perfectly with my professional background and passion for innovative 
technologies. 
In my enterprise initiatie of HomeSmartify.lu, I developed of AI-powered dialogue 
systems, fine-tuning LLMs like Mistral 7B and implementing Retrieval Augmented 
Generation (RAG) techniques. I developed AI-driven webscrawler which combines the 
advantage of CSS selector and LLM, also use LLM API to further evaluate and sumamrize 
the text for newsletter and designed the HTML interface, showcasing my proficiency 
in TypeScript, React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Prior to this, at KPMG Luxembourg, I 
improved fund reconciliation processes by 30% through robust backend 
solutions.My DevOps experience at Whalecloud Technology ensures that I can deliver 
scalable, stable code in production environments. 
I strongly believe that interdisciplinary knowledge is key to harnessing AI’s full potential. 
My MBA in Blockchain & Big Data, supported by a scholarship for my proposal on 
integrating AI and Web3 technologies for IT compliance automation, reflects my dedication 
to merging technical solutions with practical business needs. Delivering this project 
demonstrated my resilience and commitment to achieving impactful results. 
What excites me most about Elastic is the opportunity to work with a diverse, distributed 
team on solutions that directly enhance security workflows through generative AI. I am 
eager to bring my experience in developing scalable AI solutions, collaborating across teams, 
and contributing to open-source initiatives to help Elastic deliver cutting-edge security 
features. 
Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the possibility of contributing to 
Elastic’s mission of transforming data-driven decision-making with innovative AI solutions. 
Best regards, 
Ruiqi Tan 
rickytan79386@gmail.com | +352 661777082
Dear Hiring Manager, 
I am excited to apply for the Data Engineer position at KPMG Belgium. With a background 
in AI, cloud-based automation, and data engineering, along with hands-on experience 
in SQL, Python, and cloud computing (Azure, AWS), I am eager to bring my technical 
expertise and problem-solving mindset to your innovative Lighthouse team. 
As a Senior IT Auditor at KPMG Luxembourg, I worked on data-driven compliance 
solutions, streamlining fund reconciliation processes that reduced runtime by 30%. This 
experience sharpened my data engineering skills in SQL, ETL pipelines, and cloud 
environments, ensuring data accuracy and regulatory alignment. Additionally, my role 
involved DORA, GDPR, and ISO 27001 compliance, requiring the ability to build secure 
and scalable data architectures. 
Beyond audit and compliance, I have developed and deployed fullstack AI-powered 
applications, such as: 
• Crypto & Blockchain Newsletter: A fullstack Flask + SQL platform 
integrating data pipelines and AI-based categorization, which I designed and 
deployed independently. 
• Fine-Tuned LLM for Smart Home Consulting: Leveraging Python, SQL, and 
cloud AI models, I developed an intelligent chatbot for home automation solutions. 
• Hybrid Web Scraper (AI & SQL): Extracted structured insights from dynamic web 
data using BeautifulSoup, OpenAI GPT-4, and SQL-based storage. 
My expertise in data engineering, cloud platforms, and AI integration aligns with KPMG 
Lighthouse’s mission to drive data-driven transformation. I am eager to contribute 
by rationalizing, migrating, and optimizing cloud data platforms, leveraging Azure, 
AWS, Python, SQL, and API-based architectures. 
I thrive in collaborative, international environments and am motivated by solving complex 
data challenges. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my experience 
and entrepreneurial mindset can contribute to KPMG Belgium’s data engineering team. 
Looking forward to your response. Thank you for your time and consideration. 
Best regards, 
Ruiqi Tan

To the Hiring Team at IEE, 
I am writing to express my strong interest in joining the Concepts & Architectures 
department at IEE. With a multidisciplinary background as a Software and DevOps 
Engineer, combined with hands-on experience in system architecture, compliance, and cross-
functional collaboration, I am confident in my ability to contribute meaningfully to your RF 
and RADAR innovation initiatives. 
During my time at KPMG Luxembourg, I led several projects centered on IT system Risk 
management, technical roadmap development, and regulatory compliance under ISO 
27001, GDPR, and DORA. This involved close collaboration with diverse stakeholders—
developers, security teams, and business units—to align architecture with operational and 
compliance goals. Prior to that, at Whale Cloud Technologies (Alibaba Group), I managed 
the deployment and orchestration of scalable systems using Docker and Kubernetes, 
directly translating business needs into resilient infrastructure design. 
My technical toolkit includes: 
• Requirements management and system analysis (experience with DOORS 
equivalents and FMEA logic) 
• DevSecOps methodologies, with strong CI/CD experience (GitHub Actions, GitLab 
CI) 
• Python, Flask, and infrastructure monitoring tools like Prometheus, Grafana, and 
the ELK Stack 
While my hands-on experience with MATLAB and Simulink is currently at a foundational 
level, I am eager to advance these skills, especially given their relevance in complex 
automotive and embedded systems. 
Multilingual in English, German, and Chinese, and proficient in French (B1), I’m 
comfortable working across cultural and functional boundaries, translating technical detail 
into structured, actionable communication. I thrive in environments where analytical 
thinking, structured problem-solving, and collaborative innovation come together to drive 
product excellence. 
Joining IEE would allow me to apply and extend my expertise in system architecture and 
cross-disciplinary engineering within a forward-thinking, international R&D context. I am 
particularly drawn to IEE’s strong reputation for innovation and its emphasis on next-
generation sensing technologies. 
Thank you for considering my application. I would welcome the opportunity to further 
discuss how I can contribute to your team. 
Warm regards, 
Ruiqi Tan
Hiring Manager 
BVNK 
Dear Hiring Manager, 
I am excited to apply for the Backend Developer position at your company. With over five 
years of industry experience in backend development, DevOps, and AI-powered solutions—
particularly within financial services—I am confident in my ability to contribute to your 
team’s innovative efforts in the FinTech sector. 
During my time at KPMG Luxembourg as a Senior IT Auditor, I led IT and data-related 
projects focusing on compliance with standards like ISO 27001 and DORA, while 
developing data reconciliation solutions that improved process efficiency by 30%. This 
experience provided me with a deep understanding of financial services, including banking, 
payments, and regulatory frameworks. I also gained practical exposure to reconciliation 
systems and back-office tooling, aligning perfectly with the needs of this role. 
Technically, I have solid backend development experience with a primary focus 
on Python and Java. My work involved building RESTful APIs and developing 
microservices architectures that leveraged event-driven systems using Kafka, ensuring high-
performance and scalable solutions. Additionally, I implemented CI/CD pipelines and 
managed containerized deployments using Docker and Kubernetes, enhancing system 
reliability and deployment efficiency. 
Beyond backend development, I have explored blockchain and distributed ledger 
technologies through my MBA program in Blockchain & Big Data and practical projects 
like automating compliance workflows with blockchain integration. These experiences have 
enriched my analytical skills, enabling me to make data-driven decisions and solve complex 
problems both independently and in collaborative environments. 
I am particularly drawn to this opportunity because it combines my passion for backend 
development with my deep interest in financial technologies. I am eager to contribute to your 
mission and am open to participating in the on-call rota to ensure continuous system 
availability. 
Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to discussing how my background 
and skills can support your team’s goals and deliver impactful solutions. 
Best regards, 
Ruiqi Tan 
rickytan79386@gmail.com | +352 661777082
